title: Spicy chicken with avocado
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/4 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 red onion, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '1 avocado, diced', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
